key_features: Color Coded Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
Able to be washed without damage
ai_description: The images show KAKSS dumbbells with a smooth, matte vinyl coating in various colors including pink, red, blue, and green. They feature hexagon-shaped ends to prevent rolling, with weight markings (0.5KG, 1KG, etc.) and the KAKSS brand printed in white. The dumbbells have a professional appearance with color-coded weights for easy identification. Some images show them in use during workouts, while others display them neatly on racks or in studio settings against clean backgrounds.
